manzils.text: bal ʿajibu an jaahum mundhirun min'hum faqala l-kafiruna hadha shayon ʿajibun
a-idha mit'na wakunna turaban dhalika rajʿun baʿidun
qad ʿalim'na ma tanqusu l-ardu min'hum waʿindana kitabun hafizun
bal kadhabu bil-haqi lamma jaahum fahum fi amrin marijin
afalam yanzuru ila l-samai fawqahum kayfa banaynaha wazayyannaha wama laha min furujin
wal-arda madadnaha wa-alqayna fiha rawasiya wa-anbatna fiha min kulli zawjin bahijin
wanazzalna mina l-samai maan mubarakan fa-anbatna bihi jannatin wahabba l-hasidi
riz'qan lil'ʿibadi wa-ahyayna bihi baldatan maytan kadhalika l-khuruju
kadhabat qablahum qawmu nuhin wa-ashabu l-rasi wathamudu
wa-ashabu l-aykati waqawmu tubbaʿin kullun kadhaba l-rusula fahaqqa waʿidi
afaʿayina bil-khalqi l-awali bal hum fi labsin min khalqin jadidin
walaqad khalaqna l-insana wanaʿlamu ma tuwaswisu bihi nafsuhu wanahnu aqrabu ilayhi min habli l-waridi
idh yatalaqqa l-mutalaqiyani ʿani l-yamini waʿani l-shimali qaʿidun
ma yalfizu min qawlin illa ladayhi raqibun ʿatidun
wajaat sakratu l-mawti bil-haqi dhalika ma kunta min'hu tahidu
wanufikha fi l-suri dhalika yawmu l-waʿidi
wajaat kullu nafsin maʿaha saiqun washahidun
laqad kunta fi ghaflatin min hadha fakashafna ʿanka ghitaaka fabasaruka l-yawma hadidun
waqala qarinuhu hadha ma ladayya ʿatidun
alqiya fi jahannama kulla kaffarin ʿanidin
alladhi jaʿala maʿa l-lahi ilahan akhara fa-alqiyahu fi l-ʿadhabi l-shadidi
qala qarinuhu rabbana ma atghaytuhu walakin kana fi dalalin baʿidin
qala la takhtasimu ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil-waʿidi
ma yubaddalu l-qawlu ladayya wama ana bizallamin lil'ʿabidi
yawma naqulu lijahannama hali im'talati wataqulu hal min mazidin
hadha ma tuʿaduna likulli awwabin hafizin
man khashiya l-rahmana bil-ghaybi wajaa biqalbin munibin
lahum ma yashauna fiha waladayna mazidun
wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu min'hum batshan fanaqqabu fi l-biladi hal min mahisin
inna fi dhalika ladhik'ra liman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa l-samʿa wahuwa shahidun
walaqad khalaqna l-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma fi sittati ayyamin wama massana min lughubin
fa-is'bir ʿala ma yaquluna wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tuluʿi l-shamsi waqabla l-ghurubi
wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunadi l-munadi min makanin qaribin
yawma yasmaʿuna l-sayhata bil-haqi dhalika yawmu l-khuruji
inna nahnu nuh'yi wanumitu wa-ilayna l-masiru
yawma tashaqqaqu l-ardu ʿanhum siraʿan dhalika hashrun ʿalayna yasirun
nahnu aʿlamu bima yaquluna wama anta ʿalayhim bijabbarin fadhakkir bil-qur'ani man yakhafu waʿidi
dhuqu fit'natakum hadha alladhi kuntum bihi tastaʿjiluna
akhidhina ma atahum rabbuhum innahum kanu qabla dhalika muh'sinina
kanu qalilan mina al-layli ma yahjaʿuna
fawarabbi l-samai wal-ardi innahu lahaqqun mith'la ma annakum tantiquna
hal ataka hadithu dayfi ib'rahima l-muk'ramina
idh dakhalu ʿalayhi faqalu salaman qala salamun qawmun munkaruna
faragha ila ahlihi fajaa biʿij'lin saminin
fa-awjasa min'hum khifatan qalu la takhaf wabasharuhu bighulamin ʿalimin
fa-aqbalati im'ra-atuhu fi sarratin fasakkat wajhaha waqalat ʿajuzun ʿaqimun
qalu kadhaliki qala rabbuki innahu huwa l-hakimu l-ʿalimu
qalu inna ur'sil'na ila qawmin muj'rimina
fa-akhrajna man kana fiha mina l-mu'minina
fama wajadna fiha ghayra baytin mina l-mus'limina
watarakna fiha ayatan lilladhina yakhafuna l-ʿadhaba l-alima
wafi musa idh arsalnahu ila fir'ʿawna bisul'tanin mubinin
fatawalla biruk'nihi waqala sahirun aw majnunun
fa-akhadhnahu wajunudahu fanabadhnahum fi l-yami wahuwa mulimun
wafi ʿadin idh arsalna ʿalayhimu l-riha l-ʿaqima
ma tadharu min shayin atat ʿalayhi illa jaʿalathu kal-ramimi
wafi thamuda idh qila lahum tamattaʿu hatta hinin
faʿataw ʿan amri rabbihim fa-akhadhathumu l-saʿiqatu wahum yanzuruna
fama is'tataʿu min qiyamin wama kanu muntasirina
waqawma nuhin min qablu innahum kanu qawman fasiqina
wamin kulli shayin khalaqna zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkaruna
fafirru ila l-lahi inni lakum min'hu nadhirun mubinun
wala tajʿalu maʿa l-lahi ilahan akhara inni lakum min'hu nadhirun mubinun
kadhalika ma ata alladhina min qablihim min rasulin illa qalu sahirun aw majnunun
atawasaw bihi bal hum qawmun taghuna
wama khalaqtu l-jina wal-insa illa liyaʿbuduni
ma uridu min'hum min riz'qin wama uridu an yut'ʿimuni
inna l-laha huwa l-razaqu dhu l-quwati l-matinu
fa-inna lilladhina zalamu dhanuban mith'la dhanubi ashabihim fala yastaʿjiluni
fawaylun lilladhina kafaru min yawmihimu alladhi yuʿaduna
yawma yudaʿʿuna ila nari jahannama daʿʿan
hadhihi l-naru allati kuntum biha tukadhibuna
afasih'run hadha am antum la tub'siruna
is'lawha fa-is'biru aw la tasbiru sawaon ʿalaykum innama tuj'zawna ma kuntum taʿmaluna
fakihina bima atahum rabbuhum wawaqahum rabbuhum ʿadhaba l-jahimi
kulu wa-ish'rabu hanian bima kuntum taʿmaluna
muttakiina ʿala sururin masfufatin wazawwajnahum bihurin ʿinin
wa-alladhina amanu wa-ittabaʿathum dhurriyyatuhum biimanin alhaqna bihim dhurriyyatahum wama alatnahum min ʿamalihim min shayin kullu im'ri-in bima kasaba rahinun
yatanazaʿuna fiha kasan la laghwun fiha wala tathimun
wayatufu ʿalayhim ghil'manun lahum ka-annahum lu'lu-on maknunun
qalu inna kunna qablu fi ahlina mush'fiqina
famanna l-lahu ʿalayna wawaqana ʿadhaba l-samumi
inna kunna min qablu nadʿuhu innahu huwa l-baru l-rahimu
fadhakkir fama anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikahinin wala majnunin
am yaquluna shaʿirun natarabbasu bihi rayba l-manuni
qul tarabbasu fa-inni maʿakum mina l-mutarabisina
am tamuruhum ahlamuhum bihadha am hum qawmun taghuna
am yaquluna taqawwalahu bal la yu'minuna
falyatu bihadithin mith'lihi in kanu sadiqina
am khuliqu min ghayri shayin am humu l-khaliquna
am khalaqu l-samawati wal-arda bal la yuqinuna
am ʿindahum khazainu rabbika am humu l-musaytiruna
am lahum sullamun yastamiʿuna fihi falyati mus'tamiʿuhum bisul'tanin mubinin
am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qaluna
am yuriduna kaydan fa-alladhina kafaru humu l-makiduna
am lahum ilahun ghayru l-lahi sub'hana l-lahi ʿamma yush'rikuna
wa-in yaraw kis'fan mina l-samai saqitan yaqulu sahabun markumun
fadharhum hatta yulaqu yawmahumu alladhi fihi yus'ʿaquna
yawma la yugh'ni ʿanhum kayduhum shayan wala hum yunsaruna
wa-inna lilladhina zalamu ʿadhaban duna dhalika walakinna aktharahum la yaʿlamuna
wa-is'bir lihuk'mi rabbika fa-innaka bi-aʿyunina wasabbih bihamdi rabbika hina taqumu
laqad raa min ayati rabbihi l-kub'ra
in hiya illa asmaon sammaytumuha antum waabaukum ma anzala l-lahu biha min sul'tanin in yattabiʿuna illa l-zana wama tahwa l-anfusu walaqad jaahum min rabbihimu l-huda
wakam min malakin fi l-samawati la tugh'ni shafaʿatuhum shayan illa min baʿdi an yadhana l-lahu liman yashau wayarda
inna alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati layusammuna l-malaikata tasmiyata l-untha
wama lahum bihi min ʿil'min in yattabiʿuna illa l-zana wa-inna l-zana la yugh'ni mina l-haqi shayan
fa-aʿrid ʿan man tawalla ʿan dhik'rina walam yurid illa l-hayata l-dun'ya
dhalika mablaghuhum mina l-ʿil'mi inna rabbaka huwa aʿlamu biman dalla ʿan sabilihi wahuwa aʿlamu bimani ih'tada
walillahi ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi liyajziya alladhina asau bima ʿamilu wayajziya alladhina ahsanu bil-hus'na

alladhina yajtanibuna kabaira l-ith'mi wal-fawahisha illa l-lamama inna rabbaka wasiʿu l-maghfirati huwa aʿlamu bikum idh ansha-akum mina l-ardi wa-idh antum ajinnatun fi butuni ummahatikum fala tuzakku anfusakum huwa aʿlamu bimani ittaqa
am lam yunabba bima fi suhufi musa
wa-an laysa lil'insani illa ma saʿa
waqawma nuhin min qablu innahum kanu hum azlama wa-atgha
laysa laha min duni l-lahi kashifatun
wa-in yaraw ayatan yuʿ'ridu wayaqulu sih'run mus'tamirrun
wakadhabu wa-ittabaʿu ahwaahum wakullu amrin mus'taqirrun
walaqad jaahum mina l-anbai ma fihi muz'dajarun
fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu l-daʿi ila shayin nukurin
khushaʿan absaruhum yakhrujuna mina l-ajdathi ka-annahum jaradun muntashirun
muh'tiʿina ila l-daʿi yaqulu l-kafiruna hadha yawmun ʿasirun
kadhabat qablahum qawmu nuhin fakadhabu ʿabdana waqalu majnunun wa-uz'dujira
wafajjarna l-arda ʿuyunan fal-taqa l-mau ʿala amrin qad qudira
tajri bi-aʿyunina jazaan liman kana kufira
walaqad taraknaha ayatan fahal min muddakirin
walaqad yassarna l-qur'ana lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
kadhabat ʿadun fakayfa kana ʿadhabi wanudhuri
inna arsalna ʿalayhim rihan sarsaran fi yawmi nahsin mus'tamirrin
tanziʿu l-nasa ka-annahum aʿjazu nakhlin munqaʿirin
walaqad yassarna l-qur'ana lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
faqalu abasharan minna wahidan nattabiʿuhu inna idhan lafi dalalin wasuʿurin
a-ul'qiya l-dhik'ru ʿalayhi min baynina bal huwa kadhabun ashirun
inna mur'silu l-naqati fit'natan lahum fa-ir'taqib'hum wa-is'tabir
wanabbi'hum anna l-maa qis'matun baynahum kullu shir'bin muh'tadarun
inna arsalna ʿalayhim sayhatan wahidatan fakanu kahashimi l-muh'taziri
walaqad yassarna l-qur'ana lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
inna arsalna ʿalayhim hasiban illa ala lutin najjaynahum bisaharin
niʿ'matan min ʿindina kadhalika najzi man shakara
walaqad rawaduhu ʿan dayfihi fatamasna aʿyunahum fadhuqu ʿadhabi wanudhuri
walaqad yassarna l-qur'ana lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
kadhabu biayatina kulliha fa-akhadhnahum akhdha ʿazizin muq'tadirin
akuffarukum khayrun min ulaikum am lakum baraatun fi l-zuburi
bali l-saʿatu mawʿiduhum wal-saʿatu adha wa-amarru
yawma yus'habuna fi l-nari ʿala wujuhihim dhuqu massa saqara
wama amruna illa wahidatun kalamhin bil-basari
walaqad ahlakna ashyaʿakum fahal min muddakirin
fi maqʿadi sid'qin ʿinda malikin muq'tadirin
wa-aqimu l-wazna bil-qis'ti wala tukh'siru l-mizana
wakhalaqa l-jana min marijin min narin
walahu l-jawari l-munshaatu fi l-bahri kal-aʿlami
wayabqa wajhu rabbika dhu l-jalali wal-ik'rami
yasaluhu man fi l-samawati wal-ardi kulla yawmin huwa fi shanin
yamaʿshara l-jini wal-insi ini is'tataʿtum an tanfudhu min aqtari l-samawati wal-ardi fa-unfudhu la tanfudhuna illa bisul'tanin
yur'salu ʿalaykuma shuwazun min narin wanuhasun fala tantasirani
fa-idha inshaqqati l-samau fakanat wardatan kal-dihani
fayawma-idhin la yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun wala jannun
yuʿ'rafu l-muj'rimuna bisimahum fayu'khadhu bil-nawasi wal-aqdami
hadhihi jahannamu allati yukadhibu biha l-muj'rimuna
muttakiina ʿala furushin batainuha min is'tabraqin wajana l-janatayni danin
fihinna qasiratu l-tarfi lam yatmith'hunna insun qablahum wala jannun
lam yatmith'hunna insun qablahum wala jannun
muttakiina ʿala rafrafin khud'rin waʿabqariyyin hisanin
tabaraka us'mu rabbika dhi l-jalali wal-ik'rami
la yasmaʿuna fiha laghwan wala tathiman
wakanu yaquluna a-idha mit'na wakunna turaban waʿizaman a-inna lamabʿuthuna
nahnu qaddarna baynakumu l-mawta wama nahnu bimasbuqina
ʿala an nubaddila amthalakum wanunshi-akum fi ma la taʿlamuna
walaqad ʿalim'tumu l-nashata l-ula falawla tadhakkaruna
law nashau lajaʿalnahu hutaman fazaltum tafakkahuna
a-antum anzaltumuhu mina l-muz'ni am nahnu l-munziluna
law nashau jaʿalnahu ujajan falawla tashkuruna
a-antum anshatum shajarataha am nahnu l-munshiuna
wanahnu aqrabu ilayhi minkum walakin la tub'siruna
wa-amma in kana min ashabi l-yamini
wa-amma in kana mina l-mukadhibina l-dalina
sabbaha lillahi ma fi l-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa l-ʿazizu l-hakimu
lahu mul'ku l-samawati wal-ardi yuh'yi wayumitu wahuwa ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
huwa l-awalu wal-akhiru wal-zahiru wal-batinu wahuwa bikulli shayin ʿalimun

huwa alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ʿala l-ʿarshi yaʿlamu ma yaliju fi l-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina l-samai wama yaʿruju fiha wahuwa maʿakum ayna ma kuntum wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna basirun
lahu mul'ku l-samawati wal-ardi wa-ila l-lahi tur'jaʿu l-umuru
yuliju al-layla fi l-nahari wayuliju l-nahara fi al-layli wahuwa ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
aminu bil-lahi warasulihi wa-anfiqu mimma jaʿalakum mus'takhlafina fihi fa-alladhina amanu minkum wa-anfaqu lahum ajrun kabirun
wama lakum la tu'minuna bil-lahi wal-rasulu yadʿukum litu'minu birabbikum waqad akhadha mithaqakum in kuntum mu'minina
huwa alladhi yunazzilu ʿala ʿabdihi ayatin bayyinatin liyukh'rijakum mina l-zulumati ila l-nuri wa-inna l-laha bikum laraufun rahimun

wama lakum alla tunfiqu fi sabili l-lahi walillahi mirathu l-samawati wal-ardi la yastawi minkum man anfaqa min qabli l-fathi waqatala ulaika aʿzamu darajatan mina alladhina anfaqu min baʿdu waqatalu wakullan waʿada l-lahu l-hus'na wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna khabirun
man dha alladhi yuq'ridu l-laha qardan hasanan fayudaʿifahu lahu walahu ajrun karimun
yawma tara l-mu'minina wal-mu'minati yasʿa nuruhum bayna aydihim wabi-aymanihim bush'rakumu l-yawma jannatun tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha dhalika huwa l-fawzu l-ʿazimu

yawma yaqulu l-munafiquna wal-munafiqatu lilladhina amanu unzuruna naqtabis min nurikum qila ir'jiʿu waraakum fal-tamisu nuran faduriba baynahum bisurin lahu babun batinuhu fihi l-rahmatu wazahiruhu min qibalihi l-ʿadhabu
yunadunahum alam nakun maʿakum qalu bala walakinnakum fatantum anfusakum watarabbastum wa-ir'tabtum wagharratkumu l-amaniyu hatta jaa amru l-lahi wagharrakum bil-lahi l-gharuru
fal-yawma la yu'khadhu minkum fid'yatun wala mina alladhina kafaru mawakumu l-naru hiya mawlakum wabi'sa l-masiru

alam yani lilladhina amanu an takhshaʿa qulubuhum lidhik'ri l-lahi wama nazala mina l-haqi wala yakunu ka-alladhina utu l-kitaba min qablu fatala ʿalayhimu l-amadu faqasat qulubuhum wakathirun min'hum fasiquna
iʿ'lamu anna l-laha yuh'yi l-arda baʿda mawtiha qad bayyanna lakumu l-ayati laʿallakum taʿqiluna
inna l-musadiqina wal-musadiqati wa-aqradu l-laha qardan hasanan yudaʿafu lahum walahum ajrun karimun
wa-alladhina amanu bil-lahi warusulihi ulaika humu l-sidiquna wal-shuhadau ʿinda rabbihim lahum ajruhum wanuruhum wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu l-jahimi

iʿ'lamu annama l-hayatu l-dun'ya laʿibun walahwun wazinatun watafakhurun baynakum watakathurun fi l-amwali wal-awladi kamathali ghaythin aʿjaba l-kufara nabatuhu thumma yahiju fatarahu mus'farran thumma yakunu hutaman wafi l-akhirati ʿadhabun shadidun wamaghfiratun mina l-lahi warid'wanun wama l-hayatu l-dun'ya illa mataʿu l-ghururi
sabiqu ila maghfiratin min rabbikum wajannatin ʿarduha kaʿardi l-samai wal-ardi uʿiddat lilladhina amanu bil-lahi warusulihi dhalika fadlu l-lahi yu'tihi man yashau wal-lahu dhu l-fadli l-ʿazimi
ma asaba min musibatin fi l-ardi wala fi anfusikum illa fi kitabin min qabli an nabra-aha inna dhalika ʿala l-lahi yasirun
likayla tasaw ʿala ma fatakum wala tafrahu bima atakum wal-lahu la yuhibbu kulla mukh'talin fakhurin
alladhina yabkhaluna wayamuruna l-nasa bil-bukh'li waman yatawalla fa-inna l-laha huwa l-ghaniyu l-hamidu

laqad arsalna rusulana bil-bayinati wa-anzalna maʿahumu l-kitaba wal-mizana liyaquma l-nasu bil-qis'ti wa-anzalna l-hadida fihi basun shadidun wamanafiʿu lilnnasi waliyaʿlama l-lahu man yansuruhu warusulahu bil-ghaybi inna l-laha qawiyyun ʿazizun
walaqad arsalna nuhan wa-ib'rahima wajaʿalna fi dhurriyyatihima l-nubuwata wal-kitaba famin'hum muh'tadin wakathirun min'hum fasiquna

thumma qaffayna ʿala atharihim birusulina waqaffayna biʿisa ib'ni maryama waataynahu l-injila wajaʿalna fi qulubi alladhina ittabaʿuhu rafatan warahmatan warahbaniyyatan ib'tadaʿuha ma katabnaha ʿalayhim illa ib'tighaa rid'wani l-lahi fama raʿawha haqqa riʿayatiha faatayna alladhina amanu min'hum ajrahum wakathirun min'hum fasiquna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu l-laha waaminu birasulihi yu'tikum kif'layni min rahmatihi wayajʿal lakum nuran tamshuna bihi wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
li-alla yaʿlama ahlu l-kitabi alla yaqdiruna ʿala shayin min fadli l-lahi wa-anna l-fadla biyadi l-lahi yu'tihi man yashau wal-lahu dhu l-fadli l-ʿazimi
qad samiʿa l-lahu qawla allati tujadiluka fi zawjiha watashtaki ila l-lahi wal-lahu yasmaʿu tahawurakuma inna l-laha samiʿun basirun
alladhina yuzahiruna minkum min nisaihim ma hunna ummahatihim in ummahatuhum illa allai waladnahum wa-innahum layaquluna munkaran mina l-qawli wazuran wa-inna l-laha laʿafuwwun ghafurun
wa-alladhina yuzahiruna min nisaihim thumma yaʿuduna lima qalu fatahriru raqabatin min qabli an yatamassa dhalikum tuʿazuna bihi wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna khabirun

faman lam yajid fasiyamu shahrayni mutatabiʿayni min qabli an yatamassa faman lam yastatiʿ fa-it'ʿamu sittina mis'kinan dhalika litu'minu bil-lahi warasulihi watil'ka hududu l-lahi walil'kafirina ʿadhabun alimun
inna alladhina yuhadduna l-laha warasulahu kubitu kama kubita alladhina min qablihim waqad anzalna ayatin bayyinatin walil'kafirina ʿadhabun muhinun
yawma yabʿathuhumu l-lahu jamiʿan fayunabbi-uhum bima ʿamilu ahsahu l-lahu wanasuhu wal-lahu ʿala kulli shayin shahidun

alam tara anna l-laha yaʿlamu ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi ma yakunu min najwa thalathatin illa huwa rabiʿuhum wala khamsatin illa huwa sadisuhum wala adna min dhalika wala akthara illa huwa maʿahum ayna ma kanu thumma yunabbi-uhum bima ʿamilu yawma l-qiyamati inna l-laha bikulli shayin ʿalimun

alam tara ila alladhina nuhu ʿani l-najwa thumma yaʿuduna lima nuhu ʿanhu wayatanajawna bil-ith'mi wal-ʿud'wani wamaʿsiyati l-rasuli wa-idha jauka hayyawka bima lam yuhayyika bihi l-lahu wayaquluna fi anfusihim lawla yuʿadhibuna l-lahu bima naqulu hasbuhum jahannamu yaslawnaha fabi'sa l-masiru
yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha tanajaytum fala tatanajaw bil-ith'mi wal-ʿud'wani wamaʿsiyati l-rasuli watanajaw bil-biri wal-taqwa wa-ittaqu l-laha alladhi ilayhi tuh'sharuna
innama l-najwa mina l-shaytani liyahzuna alladhina amanu walaysa bidarrihim shayan illa bi-idh'ni l-lahi waʿala l-lahi falyatawakkali l-mu'minuna

yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha qila lakum tafassahu fi l-majalisi fa-if'sahu yafsahi l-lahu lakum wa-idha qila unshuzu fa-unshuzu yarfaʿi l-lahu alladhina amanu minkum wa-alladhina utu l-ʿil'ma darajatin wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna khabirun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha najaytumu l-rasula faqaddimu bayna yaday najwakum sadaqatan dhalika khayrun lakum wa-atharu fa-in lam tajidu fa-inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
a-ashfaqtum an tuqaddimu bayna yaday najwakum sadaqatin fa-idh lam tafʿalu wataba l-lahu ʿalaykum fa-aqimu l-salata waatu l-zakata wa-atiʿu l-laha warasulahu wal-lahu khabirun bima taʿmaluna
alam tara ila alladhina tawallaw qawman ghadiba l-lahu ʿalayhim ma hum minkum wala min'hum wayahlifuna ʿala l-kadhibi wahum yaʿlamuna
aʿadda l-lahu lahum ʿadhaban shadidan innahum saa ma kanu yaʿmaluna
ittakhadhu aymanahum junnatan fasaddu ʿan sabili l-lahi falahum ʿadhabun muhinun
lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwaluhum wala awladuhum mina l-lahi shayan ulaika ashabu l-nari hum fiha khaliduna
yawma yabʿathuhumu l-lahu jamiʿan fayahlifuna lahu kama yahlifuna lakum wayahsabuna annahum ʿala shayin ala innahum humu l-kadhibuna
is'tahwadha ʿalayhimu l-shaytanu fa-ansahum dhik'ra l-lahi ulaika hiz'bu l-shaytani ala inna hiz'ba l-shaytani humu l-khasiruna
inna alladhina yuhadduna l-laha warasulahu ulaika fi l-adhalina
kataba l-lahu la-aghlibanna ana warusuli inna l-laha qawiyyun ʿazizun

la tajidu qawman yu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi l-akhiri yuwadduna man hadda l-laha warasulahu walaw kanu abaahum aw abnaahum aw ikh'wanahum aw ʿashiratahum ulaika kataba fi qulubihimu l-imana wa-ayyadahum biruhin min'hu wayud'khiluhum jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha radiya l-lahu ʿanhum waradu ʿanhu ulaika hiz'bu l-lahi ala inna hiz'ba l-lahi humu l-muf'lihuna
sabbaha lillahi ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi wahuwa l-ʿazizu l-hakimu

huwa alladhi akhraja alladhina kafaru min ahli l-kitabi min diyarihim li-awwali l-hashri ma zanantum an yakhruju wazannu annahum maniʿatuhum husunuhum mina l-lahi fa-atahumu l-lahu min haythu lam yahtasibu waqadhafa fi qulubihimu l-ruʿ'ba yukh'ribuna buyutahum bi-aydihim wa-aydi l-mu'minina fa-iʿ'tabiru yauli l-absari
walawla an kataba l-lahu ʿalayhimu l-jalaa laʿadhabahum fi l-dun'ya walahum fi l-akhirati ʿadhabu l-nari
dhalika bi-annahum shaqqu l-laha warasulahu waman yushaqqi l-laha fa-inna l-laha shadidu l-ʿiqabi
ma qataʿtum min linatin aw taraktumuha qaimatan ʿala usuliha fabi-idh'ni l-lahi waliyukh'ziya l-fasiqina
wama afaa l-lahu ʿala rasulihi min'hum fama awjaftum ʿalayhi min khaylin wala rikabin walakinna l-laha yusallitu rusulahu ʿala man yashau wal-lahu ʿala kulli shayin qadirun

ma afaa l-lahu ʿala rasulihi min ahli l-qura falillahi walilrrasuli walidhi l-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wa-ib'ni l-sabili kay la yakuna dulatan bayna l-aghniyai minkum wama atakumu l-rasulu fakhudhuhu wama nahakum ʿanhu fa-intahu wa-ittaqu l-laha inna l-laha shadidu l-ʿiqabi
lil'fuqarai l-muhajirina alladhina ukh'riju min diyarihim wa-amwalihim yabtaghuna fadlan mina l-lahi warid'wanan wayansuruna l-laha warasulahu ulaika humu l-sadiquna

wa-alladhina tabawwau l-dara wal-imana min qablihim yuhibbuna man hajara ilayhim wala yajiduna fi sudurihim hajatan mimma utu wayu'thiruna ʿala anfusihim walaw kana bihim khasasatun waman yuqa shuhha nafsihi fa-ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
wa-alladhina jau min baʿdihim yaquluna rabbana igh'fir lana wali-ikh'wanina alladhina sabaquna bil-imani wala tajʿal fi qulubina ghillan lilladhina amanu rabbana innaka raufun rahimun

alam tara ila alladhina nafaqu yaquluna li-ikh'wanihimu alladhina kafaru min ahli l-kitabi la-in ukh'rij'tum lanakhrujanna maʿakum wala nutiʿu fikum ahadan abadan wa-in qutil'tum lanansurannakum wal-lahu yashhadu innahum lakadhibuna
la-in ukh'riju la yakhrujuna maʿahum wala-in qutilu la yansurunahum wala-in nasaruhum layuwallunna l-adbara thumma la yunsaruna
la-antum ashaddu rahbatan fi sudurihim mina l-lahi dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la yafqahuna
la yuqatilunakum jamiʿan illa fi quran muhassanatin aw min warai judurin basuhum baynahum shadidun tahsabuhum jamiʿan waqulubuhum shatta dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la yaʿqiluna
kamathali alladhina min qablihim qariban dhaqu wabala amrihim walahum ʿadhabun alimun
kamathali l-shaytani idh qala lil'insani uk'fur falamma kafara qala inni barion minka inni akhafu l-laha rabba l-ʿalamina
fakana ʿaqibatahuma annahuma fi l-nari khalidayni fiha wadhalika jazau l-zalimina
yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu l-laha waltanzur nafsun ma qaddamat lighadin wa-ittaqu l-laha inna l-laha khabirun bima taʿmaluna
wala takunu ka-alladhina nasu l-laha fa-ansahum anfusahum ulaika humu l-fasiquna
la yastawi ashabu l-nari wa-ashabu l-janati ashabu l-janati humu l-faizuna
law anzalna hadha l-qur'ana ʿala jabalin lara-aytahu khashiʿan mutasaddiʿan min khashyati l-lahi watil'ka l-amthalu nadribuha lilnnasi laʿallahum yatafakkaruna
huwa l-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa ʿalimu l-ghaybi wal-shahadati huwa l-rahmanu l-rahimu
huwa l-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa l-maliku l-qudusu l-salamu l-mu'minu l-muhayminu l-ʿazizu l-jabaru l-mutakabiru sub'hana l-lahi ʿamma yush'rikuna
huwa l-lahu l-khaliqu l-bari-u l-musawiru lahu l-asmau l-hus'na yusabbihu lahu ma fi l-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa l-ʿazizu l-hakimu

yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu ʿaduwwi waʿaduwwakum awliyaa tul'quna ilayhim bil-mawadati waqad kafaru bima jaakum mina l-haqi yukh'rijuna l-rasula wa-iyyakum an tu'minu bil-lahi rabbikum in kuntum kharajtum jihadan fi sabili wa-ib'tighaa mardati tusirruna ilayhim bil-mawadati wa-ana aʿlamu bima akhfaytum wama aʿlantum waman yafʿalhu minkum faqad dalla sawaa l-sabili
in yathqafukum yakunu lakum aʿdaan wayabsutu ilaykum aydiyahum wa-alsinatahum bil-sui wawaddu law takfuruna
lan tanfaʿakum arhamukum wala awladukum yawma l-qiyamati yafsilu baynakum wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna basirun

qad kanat lakum us'watun hasanatun fi ib'rahima wa-alladhina maʿahu idh qalu liqawmihim inna buraau minkum wamimma taʿbuduna min duni l-lahi kafarna bikum wabada baynana wabaynakumu l-ʿadawatu wal-baghdau abadan hatta tu'minu bil-lahi wahdahu illa qawla ib'rahima li-abihi la-astaghfiranna laka wama amliku laka mina l-lahi min shayin rabbana ʿalayka tawakkalna wa-ilayka anabna wa-ilayka l-masiru
rabbana la tajʿalna fit'natan lilladhina kafaru wa-igh'fir lana rabbana innaka anta l-ʿazizu l-hakimu
laqad kana lakum fihim us'watun hasanatun liman kana yarju l-laha wal-yawma l-akhira waman yatawalla fa-inna l-laha huwa l-ghaniyu l-hamidu
ʿasa l-lahu an yajʿala baynakum wabayna alladhina ʿadaytum min'hum mawaddatan wal-lahu qadirun wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
la yanhakumu l-lahu ʿani alladhina lam yuqatilukum fi l-dini walam yukh'rijukum min diyarikum an tabarruhum watuq'situ ilayhim inna l-laha yuhibbu l-muq'sitina
innama yanhakumu l-lahu ʿani alladhina qatalukum fi l-dini wa-akhrajukum min diyarikum wazaharu ʿala ikh'rajikum an tawallawhum waman yatawallahum fa-ulaika humu l-zalimuna

yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha jaakumu l-mu'minatu muhajiratin fa-im'tahinuhunna l-lahu aʿlamu biimanihinna fa-in ʿalim'tumuhunna mu'minatin fala tarjiʿuhunna ila l-kufari la hunna hillun lahum wala hum yahilluna lahunna waatuhum ma anfaqu wala junaha ʿalaykum an tankihuhunna idha ataytumuhunna ujurahunna wala tum'siku biʿisami l-kawafiri wasalu ma anfaqtum walyasalu ma anfaqu dhalikum huk'mu l-lahi yahkumu baynakum wal-lahu ʿalimun hakimun
wa-in fatakum shayon min azwajikum ila l-kufari faʿaqabtum faatu alladhina dhahabat azwajuhum mith'la ma anfaqu wa-ittaqu l-laha alladhi antum bihi mu'minuna

yaayyuha l-nabiyu idha jaaka l-mu'minatu yubayiʿ'naka ʿala an la yush'rik'na bil-lahi shayan wala yasriq'na wala yaznina wala yaqtul'na awladahunna wala yatina bibuh'tanin yaftarinahu bayna aydihinna wa-arjulihinna wala yaʿsinaka fi maʿrufin fabayiʿ'hunna wa-is'taghfir lahunna l-laha inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tatawallaw qawman ghadiba l-lahu ʿalayhim qad ya-isu mina l-akhirati kama ya-isa l-kufaru min ashabi l-quburi
sabbaha lillahi ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi wahuwa l-ʿazizu l-hakimu
yaayyuha alladhina amanu lima taquluna ma la tafʿaluna
kabura maqtan ʿinda l-lahi an taqulu ma la tafʿaluna
inna l-laha yuhibbu alladhina yuqatiluna fi sabilihi saffan ka-annahum bun'yanun marsusun
wa-idh qala musa liqawmihi yaqawmi lima tu'dhunani waqad taʿlamuna anni rasulu l-lahi ilaykum falamma zaghu azagha l-lahu qulubahum wal-lahu la yahdi l-qawma l-fasiqina

wa-idh qala ʿisa ub'nu maryama yabani is'raila inni rasulu l-lahi ilaykum musaddiqan lima bayna yadayya mina l-tawrati wamubashiran birasulin yati min baʿdi us'muhu ahmadu falamma jaahum bil-bayinati qalu hadha sih'run mubinun
waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ʿala l-lahi l-kadhiba wahuwa yud'ʿa ila l-is'lami wal-lahu la yahdi l-qawma l-zalimina
yuriduna liyut'fiu nura l-lahi bi-afwahihim wal-lahu mutimmu nurihi walaw kariha l-kafiruna
huwa alladhi arsala rasulahu bil-huda wadini l-haqi liyuz'hirahu ʿala l-dini kullihi walaw kariha l-mush'rikuna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu hal adullukum ʿala tijaratin tunjikum min ʿadhabin alimin
tu'minuna bil-lahi warasulihi watujahiduna fi sabili l-lahi bi-amwalikum wa-anfusikum dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamuna
yaghfir lakum dhunubakum wayud'khil'kum jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu wamasakina tayyibatan fi jannati ʿadnin dhalika l-fawzu l-ʿazimu
wa-ukh'ra tuhibbunaha nasrun mina l-lahi wafathun qaribun wabashiri l-mu'minina

yaayyuha alladhina amanu kunu ansara l-lahi kama qala ʿisa ub'nu maryama lil'hawariyyina man ansari ila l-lahi qala l-hawariyuna nahnu ansaru l-lahi faamanat taifatun min bani is'raila wakafarat taifatun fa-ayyadna alladhina amanu ʿala ʿaduwwihim fa-asbahu zahirina
yusabbihu lillahi ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi l-maliki l-qudusi l-ʿazizi l-hakimi
huwa alladhi baʿatha fi l-umiyina rasulan min'hum yatlu ʿalayhim ayatihi wayuzakkihim wayuʿallimuhumu l-kitaba wal-hik'mata wa-in kanu min qablu lafi dalalin mubinin
waakharina min'hum lamma yalhaqu bihim wahuwa l-ʿazizu l-hakimu
dhalika fadlu l-lahi yu'tihi man yashau wal-lahu dhu l-fadli l-ʿazimi
mathalu alladhina hummilu l-tawrata thumma lam yahmiluha kamathali l-himari yahmilu asfaran bi'sa mathalu l-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayati l-lahi wal-lahu la yahdi l-qawma l-zalimina
qul yaayyuha alladhina hadu in zaʿamtum annakum awliyau lillahi min duni l-nasi fatamannawu l-mawta in kuntum sadiqina
wala yatamannawnahu abadan bima qaddamat aydihim wal-lahu ʿalimun bil-zalimina
qul inna l-mawta alladhi tafirruna min'hu fa-innahu mulaqikum thumma turadduna ila ʿalimi l-ghaybi wal-shahadati fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum taʿmaluna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha nudiya lilssalati min yawmi l-jumuʿati fa-is'ʿaw ila dhik'ri l-lahi wadharu l-bayʿa dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamuna
fa-idha qudiyati l-salatu fa-intashiru fi l-ardi wa-ib'taghu min fadli l-lahi wa-udh'kuru l-laha kathiran laʿallakum tuf'lihuna
wa-idha ra-aw tijaratan aw lahwan infaddu ilayha watarakuka qaiman qul ma ʿinda l-lahi khayrun mina l-lahwi wamina l-tijarati wal-lahu khayru l-raziqina
idha jaaka l-munafiquna qalu nashhadu innaka larasulu l-lahi wal-lahu yaʿlamu innaka larasuluhu wal-lahu yashhadu inna l-munafiqina lakadhibuna
ittakhadhu aymanahum junnatan fasaddu ʿan sabili l-lahi innahum saa ma kanu yaʿmaluna
dhalika bi-annahum amanu thumma kafaru fatubiʿa ʿala qulubihim fahum la yafqahuna
wa-idha ra-aytahum tuʿ'jibuka ajsamuhum wa-in yaqulu tasmaʿ liqawlihim ka-annahum khushubun musannadatun yahsabuna kulla sayhatin ʿalayhim humu l-ʿaduwu fa-ih'dharhum qatalahumu l-lahu anna yu'fakuna
wa-idha qila lahum taʿalaw yastaghfir lakum rasulu l-lahi lawwaw ruusahum wara-aytahum yasudduna wahum mus'takbiruna
sawaon ʿalayhim astaghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lan yaghfira l-lahu lahum inna l-laha la yahdi l-qawma l-fasiqina
humu alladhina yaquluna la tunfiqu ʿala man ʿinda rasuli l-lahi hatta yanfaddu walillahi khazainu l-samawati wal-ardi walakinna l-munafiqina la yafqahuna
yaquluna la-in rajaʿna ila l-madinati layukh'rijanna l-aʿazu min'ha l-adhala walillahi l-ʿizatu walirasulihi walil'mu'minina walakinna l-munafiqina la yaʿlamuna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tul'hikum amwalukum wala awladukum ʿan dhik'ri l-lahi waman yafʿal dhalika fa-ulaika humu l-khasiruna
wa-anfiqu min ma razaqnakum min qabli an yatiya ahadakumu l-mawtu fayaqula rabbi lawla akhartani ila ajalin qaribin fa-assaddaqa wa-akun mina l-salihina
walan yu-akhira l-lahu nafsan idha jaa ajaluha wal-lahu khabirun bima taʿmaluna
yusabbihu lillahi ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi lahu l-mul'ku walahu l-hamdu wahuwa ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
huwa alladhi khalaqakum faminkum kafirun waminkum mu'minun wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna basirun
khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi wasawwarakum fa-ahsana suwarakum wa-ilayhi l-masiru
yaʿlamu ma fi l-samawati wal-ardi wayaʿlamu ma tusirruna wama tuʿ'linuna wal-lahu ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
alam yatikum naba-u alladhina kafaru min qablu fadhaqu wabala amrihim walahum ʿadhabun alimun
dhalika bi-annahu kanat tatihim rusuluhum bil-bayinati faqalu abasharun yahdunana fakafaru watawallaw wa-is'taghna l-lahu wal-lahu ghaniyyun hamidun
zaʿama alladhina kafaru an lan yub'ʿathu qul bala warabbi latub'ʿathunna thumma latunabba-unna bima ʿamil'tum wadhalika ʿala l-lahi yasirun
faaminu bil-lahi warasulihi wal-nuri alladhi anzalna wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna khabirun

yawma yajmaʿukum liyawmi l-jamʿi dhalika yawmu l-taghabuni waman yu'min bil-lahi wayaʿmal salihan yukaffir ʿanhu sayyiatihi wayud'khil'hu jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha abadan dhalika l-fawzu l-ʿazimu
wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu l-nari khalidina fiha wabi'sa l-masiru
ma asaba min musibatin illa bi-idh'ni l-lahi waman yu'min bil-lahi yahdi qalbahu wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalimun
wa-atiʿu l-laha wa-atiʿu l-rasula fa-in tawallaytum fa-innama ʿala rasulina l-balaghu l-mubinu
al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa waʿala l-lahi falyatawakkali l-mu'minuna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu inna min azwajikum wa-awladikum ʿaduwwan lakum fa-ih'dharuhum wa-in taʿfu watasfahu wataghfiru fa-inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
innama amwalukum wa-awladukum fit'natun wal-lahu ʿindahu ajrun ʿazimun
fa-ittaqu l-laha ma is'tataʿtum wa-is'maʿu wa-atiʿu wa-anfiqu khayran li-anfusikum waman yuqa shuhha nafsihi fa-ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
in tuq'ridu l-laha qardan hasanan yudaʿif'hu lakum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu shakurun halimun

yaayyuha l-nabiyu idha tallaqtumu l-nisaa fatalliquhunna liʿiddatihinna wa-ahsu l-ʿidata wa-ittaqu l-laha rabbakum la tukh'rijuhunna min buyutihinna wala yakhruj'na illa an yatina bifahishatin mubayyinatin watil'ka hududu l-lahi waman yataʿadda hududa l-lahi faqad zalama nafsahu la tadri laʿalla l-laha yuh'dithu baʿda dhalika amran

fa-idha balaghna ajalahunna fa-amsikuhunna bimaʿrufin aw fariquhunna bimaʿrufin wa-ashhidu dhaway ʿadlin minkum wa-aqimu l-shahadata lillahi dhalikum yuʿazu bihi man kana yu'minu bil-lahi wal-yawmi l-akhiri waman yattaqi l-laha yajʿal lahu makhrajan
wayarzuq'hu min haythu la yahtasibu waman yatawakkal ʿala l-lahi fahuwa hasbuhu inna l-laha balighu amrihi qad jaʿala l-lahu likulli shayin qadran

wa-allai ya-is'na mina l-mahidi min nisaikum ini ir'tabtum faʿiddatuhunna thalathatu ashhurin wa-allai lam yahid'na wa-ulatu l-ahmali ajaluhunna an yadaʿna hamlahunna waman yattaqi l-laha yajʿal lahu min amrihi yus'ran
dhalika amru l-lahi anzalahu ilaykum waman yattaqi l-laha yukaffir ʿanhu sayyiatihi wayuʿ'zim lahu ajran

askinuhunna min haythu sakantum min wuj'dikum wala tudarruhunna litudayyiqu ʿalayhinna wa-in kunna ulati hamlin fa-anfiqu ʿalayhinna hatta yadaʿna hamlahunna fa-in ardaʿna lakum faatuhunna ujurahunna watamiru baynakum bimaʿrufin wa-in taʿasartum fasatur'diʿu lahu ukh'ra
liyunfiq dhu saʿatin min saʿatihi waman qudira ʿalayhi riz'quhu falyunfiq mimma atahu l-lahu la yukallifu l-lahu nafsan illa ma ataha sayajʿalu l-lahu baʿda ʿus'rin yus'ran
waka-ayyin min qaryatin ʿatat ʿan amri rabbiha warusulihi fahasabnaha hisaban shadidan waʿadhabnaha ʿadhaban nuk'ran
fadhaqat wabala amriha wakana ʿaqibatu amriha khus'ran
aʿadda l-lahu lahum ʿadhaban shadidan fa-ittaqu l-laha yauli l-albabi alladhina amanu qad anzala l-lahu ilaykum dhik'ran
